wikitext.*:
{{disambig-more|Desolation of Smaug|[[Desolation of Smaug (disambiguation)]]}}[[File:The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Extended Edition - Blu-ray cover.jpg|250px|thumb|right|Blu-ray cover of the Extended Edition{{sequence |prev=[[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)|An Unexpected Journey Extended Edition]] |next=[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (extended edition)|The Battle of the Five Armies Extended Edition]] |list=The Hobbit Extended Edition
The Desolation of Smaug }}]] '''''The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug'' (extended edition)''' is an extended version of ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]''. It has 25 minutes of additional footage added back into the film (bringing its total running time up to 186 minutes), as well as multiple documentaries about the making of the film as supplements. [[File:The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Extended Edition - DVD cover.jpg|150px|right|thumb|DVD cover]] ==Special Extended Edition (disc 1)== The first disc contains the extended version of the film with the following audio commentary: * [[Peter Jackson]] and [[Philippa Boyens]] NOTE: The film is split over 2 discs for both the DVD and Blu-ray 3-D editions; the breaking point coming between chapters 23 & 24 (the Blu-ray 3-D edition also contains the regular 2-D Blu-ray version of the film as disc 3). ===New Scenes=== * 5. Queer Lodgings * 7. Where the Shadows Lie * 31. Son of Thrór ===Extended Scenes=== * 1. The Quest for Erebor * 8. The Elven-gate * 9. Mirkwood * 21. The Master of Lake-town * 22. The World of Men * 25. The Prophecy * 26. A Warm Welcome * 27. The Parting of the Company * 28. The Lonely Mountain * 29. The Spell of Concealment * 35. The Enemy Revealed ==The Appendices: Part Nine - Into the [[Rhovanion|Wilderland]]: The Chronicles of ''[[The Hobbit]]'' - Part 2 (disc 2)**== * Opening* * "A Warm Welcome" Documentary* * "Business of the State" Documentary* * "Shelter on the Long Lake" Documentary* * "In the Halls of the Elven-king" Documentary* * "Flies and Spiders" Documentary* * "Queer Lodgings" Documentary* * "On the Doorstep" Documentary* * "Inside Information" Documentary* * "Down the Swift, Dark Stream..." Documentary* * "Barrels Out of Bond" Documentary^ * "A Chance Meeting" Documentary^ * "[[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]] Rekindled" Documentary^ * "... Into the Fire" Documentary^ * Credits* [[File:The Hobbit - The Desolation of Smaug - Extended Edition - Blu-ray 3-D cover.jpg|150px|right|thumb|Blu-ray 3-D cover]] ==The Appendices: Part Ten - The Journey to Erebor (disc 3)^^== * "Summoning [[Smaug]]: The Last of the [[Fire-drakes]]" Documentary^ ** The Last and First [[Dragons|Dragon]] ** Conversations with Smaug ** Into the Dragon's Lair * "The Peoples and Denizens of Middle-earth" Documentaryº ** [[Beorn]]: The Shape-shifter ** The Spawn of [[Ungoliant]] ** The Men of [[Lake-town]] * "Realms of the [[Third Age]]: From [[Beorn's Hall|Beorn's House]] to Lake-town" Documentaryº ** Beorn's House ** [[Mirkwood]] Forest ** The [[Woodland Realm]] ** Lake-town * "The Music of ''The Hobbit''" Documentary^ ** Overture: Music of the Wilderland ** 1st Movement: The World of Men ** 2nd Movement: In the Halls of Erebor * Creditsº NOTE: * - Item is on disc 3 of DVD edition ^ - Item is on disc 4 of DVD edition º - Item is on disc 5 of DVD edition ** - Is actually disc 4 of Blu-ray 3-D edition ^^ - Is actually disc 5 of Blu-ray 3-D edition ==See also== * ''[[The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug]]'' * [[The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies (extended edition)|''The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]] * [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)|''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]] {{hobbitfilms}} {{title|italics}} [[Category:The Hobbit (film series)]] [[Category:The Hobbit (film series) DVDs]]
